folio.upgradetext: Wait a minute! We’ve updated this app and it looks like you’re using an older version. Update now to take advantage of improved features.

subscriptions.title: FREE 30-DAY TRIAL
subscriptions.intro: Download our current issue for FREE when you start a 30-day trial. Tap the blue free trial button now.

subscription.name: PlayStation Official Magazine - UK Subscriptions 3 Months
PlayStation Official Magazine - UK Subscriptions 6 Months

page.title: Restart your Subscription
page.strap: Save 50% and get instant access today
page.body:
Tap the button below to restart your subscription and download this issue now.
As a subscriber you will save 50% off the usual price and never miss an issue again!
If you don't like what you see then simply turn off auto-renew in your Apple account subscriptions page at least 24 hours before the auto-renew is due and you will not be charged.

page.title: 30-DAY FREE TRIAL
page.body:
PAY NOTHING FOR 30 DAYS WHEN YOU TAP THE BUTTON BELOW.
You're free to cancel at any time and will not be charged if you cancel during your trial period. *Scroll down page for terms & conditions.
If you don't like what you see then simply turn off auto-renew in your Apple account subscriptions page at least 24 hours before the auto-renew is due and you will not be charged.
* Please note that 30-day free trials are only available to new subscribers. If you have previously subscribed then payment will be taken immediately.

issue.title: The Heroes Issue
issue.description: Ten pages of Uncharted 4 gameplay plus the 20 Greatest PlayStation Icons of all time lead the way in an amazing issue home to 32 brand new games and a huge interview with legendary developer Tim Schafer ahead of Grim Fandango’s PS4 release.

issue.title: The Heroes Issue
issue.description: This edition of Official PlayStation Magazine is your complete guide to The Year Of PS4, featuring a world exclusive reveal from The Witcher 3, new looks at all of the biggest games of the next 12 months, and an essential starter guide for new PS4 owners.

issue.title: The new face of PS4
issue.description: Be the first to meet the new face of PlayStation 4 in our huge world exclusive on Hellblade. This issue we also celebrate 20 Years Of PlayStation and construct the ultimate Xmas Buyers Guide for all PlayStation fans.

issue.title: Assassin's Creed: Unity
issue.description: The countdown to Christmas starts with our Assassin's Creed and Grand Theft Auto V launch special, going behind the scenes of this holiday's biggest games. We’ve also got new Uncharted 4 artwork, Final Fantasy info and a FREE 32-page interview book.

issue.title: The Ultimate Guide to PS4
issue.description: Your complete guide to PS4 contains every single big release of 2015, as well as the top 20 PS4 games you can buy right now. We've also got previews of No Man's Sky, Uncharted 4, The Witcher 3 and more!

issue.title: Only on PlayStation!
issue.description: Go inside 30 amazing PlayStation exclusives in our 'Only On PlayStation' Issue, featuring hands-on tests with Bloodborne, LBP3, Until Dawn, The Order: 1886 and more! Also this month: WWE 2K15 and the ultimate Destiny review + NINE free in-game items!

issue.title: Playstation's Zombie Outbreak
issue.description: The undead have taken over OPM this issue: Dead Island 2 is the first bite in a wave of z-games including Resident Evil, Dying Light and DayZ. This month we also kick our most hated features into Room 101 and say hello to Wild and Tearaway Unfolded.

issue.title: The Issue 100 Special
issue.description: Celebrate our 100th issue with a bumper 196-pages filled with features, including the world’s best Destiny coverage; PlayStation’s 100 Greatest Games EVER; behind the scenes at Naughty Dog; and the first ever The Last Of Us Remastered review.

issue.title: The Hot 50 2014
issue.description: We’ve crammed some of the most exciting games in PlayStation history into our annual Hot 50 countdown list this issue: Uncharted 4: A Thief’s End, Rainbow Six: Siege, No Man’s Sky, MGS V: The Phantom Pain, The Division and many more. Don’t miss out!

issue.title: Homefront The Revolution
issue.description: A tiny taster of this issue's contents: world-first reveals of Homefront The Revolution and Dead Island 2, 10-pages of exclusive Call Of Duty Advanced Warfare access, two-hours in The Evil Within, your Uncharted 4 wishes, Far Cry 4 and more!

issue.title: The Order: 1886
issue.description: The new Official PlayStation Magazine is a corker, featuring brand new access to PS4 exclusive The Order: 1886, lengthy hands-on sessions with shooter Destiny and sandboxer Watch Dogs, and PlayStation's greatest ever 'WTF' moments.

issue.title: Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
issue.description: The new issue of Official PlayStation Magazine's out now, featuring Assassin's Creed Unity, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, Watch Dogs, the biggest indie games of PlayStation's future and the first play with PS4's Virtual Reality headset.

issue.title: Batman: Arkham Knight
issue.description: This month in OPM we have a 12-page exclusive first look at Batman: Arkham Knight, go undercover to investigate PS4's top-secret games, finish MGS V: Ground Zeroes TWICE, and much, much more…

issue.title: The Ultimate PS4 Handbook
issue.description: 148-page guide to PS4, with every game on the console reviewed, plus all the biggest titles coming in 2014 and beyond.

issue.title: Evolve
issue.description: World first hands-on with Evolve, massive inFamous: Second Son playtest, Alien: Isolation and much more…

issue.title: The Ultimate Guide To Minecraft!
issue.description: The Ultimate Guide To Minecraft returns, with all new content! We've guides, handbooks, all the latest info - everything you need whether you're a veteran or a newcomer!

issue.title: Alien Isolation
issue.description: Extended first look at Alien: Isolation, GT6 reviewed, Thief hands-on and much more…

issue.title: The Complete Guide to RoboCop
issue.description: The COMPLETE Guide to RoboCop. Over 50 pages on the making of the new movie, with all-new interviews with stars and filmmakers, plus tons of coverage on the original trilogy, the TV series, the cartoons and the comics.

issue.title: Dark Souls II
issue.description: Game Of The Year 2013, FIFA 14 review, 2014: The Year OF PS4

issue.title: PS4 Launch Special
issue.description: Massive PS4 hands-on, launch games tested, Killzone/COD reviews, and much more…

issue.title: PS4 vs Xbox One
issue.description: How do next-gen consoles improve on current gaming machines? Which is better - PS4 or Xbox One? What are the best games? We answer all these questions, and many more, in our extensive next-gen console buying guide, with expert advice from the publishers of Gamesmaster, PC Gamer, CVG and Edge. We take you through each console's technical specifications in jargon-free english, plus outline the best games, peripherals and more to help you make smarter buying decisions - with written editorials, videos and screenshot galleries optimised for iPad.

issue.title: PS4 pre-order guide
issue.description: Assassin's Creed PS4 hands-on, Batman: Arkham Origins Review, 51 greatest LittleBigPlanet levels and more…

issue.title: Complete PS4 Guide
issue.description: The games, the tech, the future: this is your ultimate PlayStation 4 handbook.

issue.title: Xmas Games Special
issue.description: Top 10 Christmas pre-orders, GTA V review, PS4 release date

issue.title: Odeon Sampler
issue.description: This month we catch fire with the return of the Hunger Games and get turned upside down by Gravity - plus of course there's all the latest film facts, news and competitions!

issue.title: Watch Dogs
issue.description: Watch Dogs hands-on and feature, 36 things you never knew about GTA, NFS Rivals playtested, and more.

issue.title: PS4 pre-order guide
issue.description: Gear up for the launch of PS4 with our pre-order special covering full detals of the console, the games, and where to get one.

issue.title: The Hot 50
issue.description: PS4 revealed, The 50 hottest games coming to PlayStation, and much more…

issue.title: The Power Of PS4
issue.description: Four huge PS4 exclusives: Watch Dogs, Assassin's Creed IV, Driveclub, Call Of Duty: Ghosts; The A to Z of PS4; Everything you ever wanted to know about GTA V; The Last Of Us review. Plus: new look mag!

issue.title: Killzone: Shadow Fall
issue.description: Killzone: Shadow Fall exlusive, Diablo III on PS4, Metro: Last Light review and more…

issue.title: Thief
issue.description: PS4's launch line-up predicted, Thief revealed, Bioshock Infinite review, and more…

issue.title: PS4
issue.description: PS4 reveal special, hands-on with The Last Of Us, first-look at Destiny.

issue.title: The Future of Killzone
issue.description: First hands-on with Killzone: Mercenary & Tearaway, the future of Call Of Duty, reviews of Dead Space 3 and Metal Gear Rising.

issue.title: Football Week
issue.description: In association with {Mag Name} enjoy 5 FREE issues of our brand new sister title Football Week! Download today to find out more…

issue.title: Bioshock Infinite
issue.description: Bioshock Infinite played at last, massive Metal Gear hands-on, DMC review.

issue.title: Beyond: Two Souls
issue.description: 2013 preview special, your top 40 of 2012, next-gen exposed, and more…

issue.title: Hitman: Absolution Gamebook
issue.description: You are Agent 47 in this unique interactive gamebook based on real missions from Hitman: Absolution.

issue.title: Black Ops II Launch
issue.description: Call Of Duty: Black Ops II launch special, Dishonored guide, GTA V info burst.

issue.title: Hitman Absolution
issue.description: Hitman Absolution exclusive review, Metal Gear special, Call Of Duty: Black Ops II preview.

issue.title: Assassin's Creed III
issue.description: Asassin's Creed III first hands-on, three hour Far Cry 3 playtest, FIFA 13 review.

issue.title: Call of Duty Multiplayer
issue.description: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 2 multiplayer reveal, greatest 75 PlayStation games of all time.

issue.title: Star Wars 1313
issue.description: Star Wars 1313 exclusive, Sleeping Dogs review, Tomb Raider hands-on

issue.title: PlayStation's Hot 50
issue.description: PlayStation's Hot 50, FIFA 12 hands-on, Beyond: first look

issue.title: Edge Sampler
issue.description: *iPAD ONLY* Sample the new interactive edition of Edge for FREE. Every page is now designed bespoke for iPad – featuring exclusive content, HD video, screenshot galleries, Retina support, animated images, searchable text and article sharing.

issue.title: Hitman Absolution
issue.description: Hitman Absolution hands-on, Dead Space 3 reveal, Euro 2012 predictions.

issue.title: Call of Duty Black Ops II
issue.description: Call Of Duty: Black Ops II reveal, new Assassin's Creed III details, OPM vs Ladyhawke.

issue.title: Aliens
issue.description: Aliens Colonial Marines hands-on, Gran Turismo 5 marathon, PS Vita freebies.

issue.title: Assassin's Creed III
issue.description: Assassin's Creed III reveal, Mass Effect 3 review, PS Vita launch

issue.title: PlayStation Vita Guide
issue.description: Welcome to our Playstation Vita Complete Launch Guide!

issue.title: Prototype 2
issue.description: Thinking of buying a PS Vita? This issue's A-Z of Sony's ace new handheld and reviews special covering its launch line-up covers everything you need to know. Elsehwere check out the goriest game on PS3 in Prototype 2, the 13 games so awful you have to play them, new Hitman Absolution info and screens, and the first shots and details of Resident Evil 6.

issue.title: The Last of Us
issue.description: Welcome to the February issue of Official PlayStation Magazine, the complete guide to PlayStation gaming, offering complete coverage of PS3, PS2 and PSP

issue.description: Welcome to the January issue of Official PlayStation Magazine, the complete guide to PlayStation gaming, offering complete coverage of PS3, PS2 and PSP

issue.title: SoulCalibur V Special
issue.description: From the makers of Official PlayStation Magazine everything you need to know about 2012's champion fighter

issue.title: Hideo Kojima
issue.description: Hideo Kojima talks MGS, the latest GTA V details, plus every Xmas hit reviewed.

issue.title: Tesco Sampler
issue.description: In association with Tesco we are giving you the chance to immerse yourself in a world of digital delights with the latest edition of the technology & entertainment magazine. You can get every issue for FREE by going to newsstand and downloading the container app.
